name: Cold Rest
description:
This is an old puzzle game I made in RPG Maker VX and originally released in 2015. It’s focused on the type of puzzles where you slide across a frozen surface and can’t stop until you hit a wall. I’ve always though these puzzles where kind of neat but in most games I’ve seen them in they’re incredibly easy and basic. So I made game that features them with increasing difficulty and complexity. It’s not a long game but the difficulty ramps up quickly.

You play as a mysterious protagonist who finds himself wandering trough a strange cave system covered in snow and ice. Can you find out what fate awaits this young lad by the end of the game?
